file.name: openapi.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.1
info:
  title: OpenAPI definition
  version: v0
servers:
- url: http://localhost
  description: Generated server url
tags:
- name: TODOs
  description: Manage TODOs
paths:
  /api/v1/todos:
    get:
      tags:
      - TODOs
      summary: Get TODOs
      operationId: getAll
      responses:
        "200":
          description: The TODOs are returned successfully
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/ToDoDetailsResponseDto'
  /api/v1/todos/{id}:
    get:
      tags:
      - TODOs
      summary: Get TODO by id
      operationId: getById
      parameters:
      - name: id
        in: path
        description: The id of the TODO
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
          format: uuid
        example: 00000000-00000000-00000000-00000000
      responses:
        "200":
          description: The TODO is returned successfully
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ToDoDetailsResponseDto'
        "404":
          description: TODO not found
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorResponseDto'
    delete:
      tags:
      - TODOs
      summary: Delete TODO by id
      operationId: delete
      parameters:
      - name: id
        in: path
        description: The id of the TODO
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
          format: uuid
        example: 00000000-00000000-00000000-00000000
      responses:
        "204":
          description: The TODO is deleted successfully
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ToDoDetailsResponseDto'
        "404":
          description: TODO not found
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorResponseDto'
components:
  schemas:
    ToDoDetailsResponseDto:
      type: object
      properties:
        id:
          type: string
          description: The id of the TODO
          format: uuid
        title:
          type: string
          description: The title of the TODO
          example: Clean House
        done:
          type: boolean
          description: The status of the TODO
          example: true
    ErrorResponseDto:
      type: object
      properties:
        code:
          type: string
          description: The unique identifier of the error
        message:
          type: string
          description: The detailed description of the error
        status:
          type: integer
          description: The HTTP status associated with the error
          format: int32
        timestamp:
          type: string
          description: The timestamp when the error occurred
          format: date-time
